entry.title: Photos Post 35: Special Events (after 1975), Part 01
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 11 Photos of the special event 1913-0000 Pūjā on a Large Sofa Bed with Meditation and Writing, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 10 medium/high resolutions and 1 medium resolution from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 11 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 1913.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

The direct link to the 3 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 1913.
